instruction.en:
Automatic inclusion: 
When the device is inserted into an electrical outlet, it’s in automatical inclusion mode for four minutes (Network Wide Inclusion, NWI). This means that the device should now be added automatically.
To manually add device to network: 
 Press the button on the device three times fast. 
If the device is not added to any Z-wave network, the LED will flash red slowly.

hint.en: Z-Wave Plus Lifeline - Plug status - Max 1 node
The plug will send Basic Set control signals to the nodes in this group whenever the status of the plug changes. This will work like a master/slave solution. Maximum 10 nodes.

instruction.en: Select 'Remove a device' from Homey settings under 'Z-wave'. Press the button on the device three times fast. The device will now be removed from the Z­-wave network

hint.en: Number of minutes before it automatically­ switches off. Default value: 0 (disabled).

Decide what the plug should do after power failure. 
Possible values: 0: Always off, 1: Remember status (Default), 2: Always on.
Set the intensity of the LED indicator in %. Default value: 100. Possible values: 0­-100
